nodes.text: The Vanderijar was a Hutt kajidic during the Galactic Civil War. At one point, forces loyal to clan members Mennac and Jobwah fought against forces of the Grim Destiny, a bounty hunting group led by Garm Trodask. This skirmish took place on the planet Trendivar.
During the time of the Galactic Civil War, Vanderijar held a seat on the Hutt Ruling Council, the ruling body of the Hutt species.
